scripts.bundle-ignition: microbundle -i resources/js/ignition/index.tsx -o resources/compiled/ignition.js --jsx React.createElement -f cjs --no-sourcemap --external none --define process.env.NODE_ENV='production'
scripts.bundle-ignition-dev: microbundle -i resources/js/ignition/index.tsx -o resources/compiled/ignition.js --jsx React.createElement -f cjs --no-sourcemap --external none --define process.env.NODE_ENV='production' --no-compress
scripts.bundle: microbundle -i resources/js/shared/ErrorUI.tsx -o resources/compiled/error-ui.js --jsx React.createElement -f modern --no-sourcemap --external react react-dom  --define process.env.NODE_ENV='production'

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && yarn bundle-ignition && git add resources/compiled/ignition.js && git add resources/compiled/ignition.css
